channel.title: Yell Help!
channel.description: Hello I was wondering why this happens when I yell in my server, so when i yell and say something it will say owner then my name but say my name is Faytal it will capatilize the F and the A how do i make it so its just the F not the A?

item.title: Yell Help!
item.dc:creator: @elite_expert elite expert
item.description:
@elite_expert wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:4, topic:526414”]Why do you have 2 yell commands?

Does it do it to all players, or just you?[/quote]
tbh i think the second 1 is just for muted people but they already have a muted 1 in the first yell command so maybe if i take the second 1 out it would fix that problem and yes every1 can see it

Read full topic

item.title: Yell Help!
item.dc:creator: @elite_expert elite expert
item.description:
@elite_expert wrote:

Null Amount:

Post your yell command.

Here it is

	/**if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) {
    String text = playerCommand.substring(5);
    String[] bad = {"chalreq", "duelreq", "tradereq", ". com", "c0m", "com", 
                        "org", "net", "biz", ". net", ". org", ". biz", 
                        ". no-ip", "- ip", ".no-ip.biz", "no-ip.org", "servegame",
                        ".com", ".net", ".org", "no-ip", "****", "is gay", "****",
                        "crap", "rubbish", ". com", ". serve", ". no-ip", ". net", ". biz"};
    for(int i = 0; i < bad.length; i++){
        if(text.indexOf(bad[i]) >= 0){
            c.sendMessage("You cannot use one of the words you just said in yell!");
            return;
        }
    }
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
        Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
            if(Connection.isMuted(c)){
                c.sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
                return;
            }           
             
            if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights == 4 )) {
                c2.sendMessage("@dbl@Donator@bla@ "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
            }else if (c.playerRights == 1) {
                c2.sendMessage("@gre@Moderator@bla@ "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
            }else if (c.playerRights == 2) {
                c2.sendMessage("@or3@Administrator@bla@ "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
            }else if (c.playerRights == 6) {
                c2.sendMessage("@blu@Extreme Donor@bla@ "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
            }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
                c2.sendMessage("@red@Owner@bla@ "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
            }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(" ")) {
                c2.sendMessage("@red@Co-Owner@bla@ "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
            }else if (c.isDonator == 0) {
                c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this command!");
            }else if (Connection.isMuted(c)) {
                c.sendMessage("You may not yell since you are muted!");
                return;
                     
            }
        }
    }
}					
				
				if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) {
				String text = playerCommand.substring(5);
                String[] bad = {"chalreq", "duelreq", "tradereq", ". com", "c0m", "com", 
                        "org", "net", "biz", ". net", ". org", ". biz", 
                        ". no-ip", "- ip", ".no-ip.biz", "no-ip.org", "servegame",
                        ".com", ".net", ".org", "no-ip", "****", "is gay", "****",
                        "crap", "rubbish", ". com", ". serve", ". no-ip", ". net", ". biz"};
                for(int i = 0; i < bad.length; i++){
                    if(text.indexOf(bad[i]) >= 0){
                        return;
                    }
                }
					
				String m = playerCommand.substring(4).toLowerCase();
				if (playerCommand.substring(5).contains("@")) {
							c.sendMessage("You may not use the symbol '@'.");
							return;
						}
				if (Connection.isMuted(c)) {
					c.sendMessage("You cannot yell you are muted.");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 0) {
					c.sendMessage("You do not have access to the yell channel.");
				} else {
					c.getPA().sendYell(Misc.optimizeText(m));
				}
			}

Read full topic
